tablemodels

Class TermekTablaModell

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • tablemodels.TermekTablaModell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel, TablaModell

    public class TermekTablaModell
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
implements TablaModell
    Manages the table data insert, gets the values from the table, etc. pretty much everything an AbstractTableModel has to do. It has numerous attributes as well, such as the DEBUG variable, (stolen from Java Tutorials), which sets whether the standard input displays the modifications in the table or not. This particular model has 3 collections: one List of TermekRekord type items, one Map to make the referencing to the columns easier, and a List of Termek for storing the price list.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • arlistafajl

        private java.io.File arlistafajl
        The arlistafajl. the file that stores the product and prices. it has to be in a txt format, and begins with "arlista" followed by a newline character, the list of the products and their prices, separated with tabs.
